title: Fathers & families harder than imagined
content:
Can anyone please provide an exact ID? Bookman was my first guess ...

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [fathers&families.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019185732/http:/typophile.com/files/fathers&families.png) | 150.48 KB |
author: george

comments.content:
Your link doesn´t seem to work....

:-(
Try re-uploading taking the ampersand out of the filename.
My guess about the attachment is this forum hasn't supported png formats. Check FAQ to see if thats the problem.
The forums do support png, but they don't support ampersands in file titles : )

Well, you can upload a file with an ampersand in the name, but you have to change the ampersand to %26 in the URL. Obviously the forum software ought to do that automatically, but in the mean time the attachment is [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019185732/http:/typophile.com/system/files?file=fathers%26families.png). So get IDing, type fiends! :-)
